subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Among the oddities to emerge from the Knicks’ muddled situation is that Isiah Thomas, who seemingly has no future with the team, is now coaching as if the future is all that matters.
snippet: Among the oddities to emerge from the Knicks’ muddled situation is that Isiah Thomas, who seemingly has no future with the team, is now coaching as if the future is all that matters.
